data.name: PSet.Name[3cdiA0qTmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Pset_DoorWindowGlazingType

data.name: PSet.Definition[3cdiA0qTmHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Properties common to the definition of the glazing component of occurrences of IfcDoor and IfcWindow, used for thermal and lighting calculations.

data.name: Property.GlassLayers.Name[]
data.value: GlassLayers

data.name: Property.GlassLayers.Definition[]
data.value: Number of glass layers within the frame. E.g. "2" for double glazing.

data.name: Property.GlassThickness1.Name[0QUUW0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: GlassThickness1

data.name: Property.GlassThickness1.Definition[0QUUW0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Thickness of the first (inner) glass layer.

data.name: Property.GlassThickness2.Name[0dbjS0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: GlassThickness2

data.name: Property.GlassThickness2.Definition[0dbjS0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Thickness of the second (intermediate or outer) glass layer.

data.name: Property.GlassThickness3.Name[0oKMm0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: GlassThickness3

data.name: Property.GlassThickness3.Definition[0oKMm0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Thickness of the third (outer) glass layer.

data.name: Property.FillGas.Name[0zf9U0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: FillGas

data.name: Property.FillGas.Definition[0zf9U0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Name of the gas by which the gap between two glass layers is filled. It is given for information purposes only.

data.name: Property.GlassColor.Name[18zyC0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: GlassColor

data.name: Property.GlassColor.Definition[18zyC0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Color (tint) selection for this glazing. It is given for information purposes only.

data.name: Property.IsTempered.Name[1Hw9I0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: IsTempered

data.name: Property.IsTempered.Definition[1Hw9I0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Indication whether the glass is tempered (TRUE) or not (FALSE) .

data.name: Property.IsLaminated.Name[1Tr5Q0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: IsLaminated

data.name: Property.IsLaminated.Definition[1Tr5Q0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Indication whether the glass is layered with other materials (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

data.name: Property.IsCoated.Name[1f9u80qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: IsCoated

data.name: Property.IsCoated.Definition[1f9u80qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Indication whether the glass is coated with a material (TRUE) or not (FALSE).

data.name: Property.IsWired.Name[1o65E0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: IsWired

data.name: Property.IsWired.Definition[1o65E0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Indication whether the glass includes a contained wire mesh to prevent break-in (TRUE) or not (FALSE)

data.name: Property.VisibleLightReflectance.Name[1wS8w0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: VisibleLightReflectance

data.name: Property.VisibleLightReflectance.Definition[1wS8w0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Fraction of the visible light that is reflected by the glazing at normal incidence. It is a value without unit.

data.name: Property.VisibleLightTransmittance.Name[20Pc_0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: VisibleLightTransmittance

data.name: Property.VisibleLightTransmittance.Definition[20Pc_0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Fraction of the visible light that passes the glazing at normal incidence. It is a value without unit.

data.name: Property.SolarAbsorption.Name[24aeq0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: SolarAbsorption

data.name: Property.SolarAbsorption.Definition[24aeq0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: (Asol) The ratio of incident solar radiation that is absorbed by a glazing system. It is the sum of the absorption distributed to the exterior (a) and to the interior (qi). Note the following equation Asol + Rsol + Tsol = 1

data.name: Property.SolarReflectance.Name[28lgg0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: SolarReflectance

data.name: Property.SolarReflectance.Definition[28lgg0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: (Rsol): The ratio of incident solar radiation that is reflected by a glazing system (also named ρe). Note the following equation Asol + Rsol + Tsol = 1

data.name: Property.SolarTransmittance.Name[2CwiW0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: SolarTransmittance

data.name: Property.SolarTransmittance.Definition[2CwiW0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: (Tsol): The ratio of incident solar radiation that directly passes through a glazing system (also named τe). Note the following equation Asol + Rsol + Tsol = 1

data.name: Property.SolarHeatGainTransmittance.Name[2Hhtm0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: SolarHeatGainTransmittance

data.name: Property.SolarHeatGainTransmittance.Definition[2Hhtm0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: (SHGC): The ratio of incident solar radiation that contributes to the heat gain of the interior, it is the solar radiation that directly passes (Tsol or τe) plus the part of the absorbed radiation that is distributed to the interior (qi). The SHGC is refered to also as g-value (g = τe + qi).

data.name: Property.ShadingCoefficient.Name[2Lsvc0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: ShadingCoefficient

data.name: Property.ShadingCoefficient.Definition[2Lsvc0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: (SC): The measure of the ability of a glazing to transmit solar heat, relative to that ability for 3 mm (1/8-inch) clear, double-strength, single glass. Shading coefficient is being phased out in favor of the solar heat gain coefficient (SHGC), and is approximately equal to the SHGC multiplied by 1.15. The shading coefficient is expressed as a number without units between 0 and 1.

data.name: Property.ThermalTransmittanceSummer.Name[2Q1xS0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: ThermalTransmittanceSummer

data.name: Property.ThermalTransmittanceSummer.Definition[2Q1xS0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Thermal transmittance coefficient (U-Value) of a material.Summer thermal transmittance coefficient of the glazing only, often referred to as (U-value).

data.name: Property.ThermalTransmittanceWinter.Name[2UCzI0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: ThermalTransmittanceWinter

data.name: Property.ThermalTransmittanceWinter.Definition[2UCzI0qTqHuO00025QrE$V]
data.value: Thermal transmittance coefficient (U-Value) of a material.Winter thermal transmittance coefficient of the glazing only, often referred to as (U-value).
